title: eBay price tracking
author: gaichu
excerpt: Sold price tracking for WrennyMoo and After Skool Hobby cards.
body_html:
You can now see eBay sold price tracking for WrennyMoo and After Skool Hobby cards.

Set pages ~ Browse wm or ash and you'll see average sold prices on each card.

Sales panel ~ Card detail pages now show a sales panel with:

  • Number of recent sales
  • Lowest/highest sold price
  • 90-day rolling average

The panel includes a link to eBay sold listings for that card.

Weekly price sync ~ A scheduled job runs every Monday at 8 AM UTC and fetches completed eBay sales using the eBay Sold Items API.

Search queries ~ Each card is searched using:

  • Keywords: Series name + card name, with spelling variants like:
("wrenny moo",wrennymoo) Pidgey
  • Excluded keywords: lot, bundle, complete, etc.

90-day rolling average ~ Each sync merges new sales with existing data, deduplicates by eBay listing ID, and filters out sales older than 90 days. Price stats are recalculated from this rolling window.

title: Gaichu database API
author: gaichu
excerpt: Public REST API for accessing the Gaichu card database.
body_html:
As requested by MetaZoo Cryptids, the Gaichu API is now publicly available!

  • Search cards by name, type, rarity, or illustrator
  • Browse all series: After Skool Hobby, Disgruntled Games, MetaZoo, OpenZoo, WrennyMoo
  • Get card images, stats, and effects
  • Multi-language support: English and Japanese text (WrennyMoo)
  • Average sold prices from eBay (WrennyMoo and After Skool Hobby)

Quick start

Fetch all OpenZoo Legacy cards:

curl "https://us-central1-gaichu-fe55f.cloudfunctions.net/api/v1/cards?series=oz&set=legacy"

Search for any card by name:

curl "https://us-central1-gaichu-fe55f.cloudfunctions.net/api/v1/cards/search?q=mothman"

Available endpoints

Cards

  • GET /v1/cards - List cards with filtering and pagination
  • GET /v1/cards/:id - Get a single card
  • GET /v1/cards/search?q= - Search by name or effect

Series & Sets

  • GET /v1/series - List all series
  • GET /v1/series/:shortName/cards - Get all cards in a series
  • GET /v1/sets/:id/cards - Get all cards in a set

Other

  • GET /v1/illustrators - List all illustrators
  • GET /v1/rarity - List rarity types
  • GET /v1/stats - Database statistics

The /v1/cards endpoint supports these filters:

  • series - ash, disgruntled, mz, oz, wm
  • set, rarity, type, illustrator
  • page & limit - Max 100 per page

Full documentation is available on GitHub.
